greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) is coefficient of x^k in Sum_{m=0..n} x^m*(1-x)^(n-m)*(-1)^[(m+1)/2]*binomial(m-[(m+1)/2],[m/2]).
link: P. Steinbach, Golden fields: a case for the heptagon, Math. Mag. 70 (1997), no. 1, 22-31.
mathematica: T[n_, k_] := (-1)^Floor[(k + 1)/2]*Binomial[n - Floor[(k + 1)/2], Floor[k/2]]; a = Table[CoefficientList[Sum[T[n, k]*p^k*(1 - p)^(n -k), {k, 0, n}], p], {n, 0, 10}]; Flatten[a]
program: if n==0: return 1 if k == 0 else 0
for n in (0..9): [A122610(n,k) for k in (0..n)] # _Peter Luschny_, Nov 20 2012
results.author: _Roger L. Bagula_ and _Gary W. Adamson_, Sep 20 2006
